pageContent: Background: Patient travel distances, coupled with variation in facility-level resources, create barriers for prostate cancer care in the Veterans Health Administration integrated delivery system. For these reasons, the authors investigated the degree to which these barriers impact the quality of prostate cancer care.

metaData.source:
Long-term potency after iodine-125 radiotherapy for prostate cancer and role of sildenafil citrate
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/14665364/
